thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears Celebrates Valentine's Day & Recovery With Daughter Maddie
thread.title_full: Jamie Lynn Spears Celebrates Valentine's Day & Recovery With Daughter Maddie

author: Jillian Frankel
title: Jamie Lynn Spears Celebrates Valentine's Day & Recovery With Daughter Maddie
text:
COMMENTS Jeff Kravitz/BBMA2016/FilmMagic Jamie Lynn Spears, Maddie Briann Aldridge and Lynne Spears at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards at T-Mobile Arena on May 22, 2016 in Las Vegas. 
Jamie Lynn Spears ' daughter Maddie is still recovering from her ATV accident earlier this month, but she and her mom still dropped off Valentine's Day treats for her classmates today. 
Spears captured the moment on Instagram with the caption, "Maddie isn't quite ready to return to school, but her doctors did clear her to bring in her Valentine's Day treats to her class today...It made her so happy to see her friends, and be able to give them such cute treats. It was a great moment for us after everything that has happened. We are so thankful to celebrate Valentine's Day with the ones we love, and we don't take a second of it for granted. Happy Valentine's Day." 
On Feb. 5, 8-year-old Maddie was driving an ATV while her parents watched nearby, but she accidentally drove it into a pond after swerving to avoid a ditch. She was airlifted to a hospital and remained unconscious until Feb. 7. She has since been released and is expected to make a full recovery. A post shared by Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) on Feb 14, 2017 at 12:50pm PST
